</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 288 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 290 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

A bull's-eye lantern emits its light in a 60-foot cone (and [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) in the next 60 feet).

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 288 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 290 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 7 sp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

A hooded lantern sheds light in a 30-foot radius (and dim light in the next 30 feet) and is equipped with shutters, which you can close to block the light. Closing or opening the shutters takes an Interact action.
